page.title: 09MID-SUSSEX EVENTS
page.content: Recent Events There are other things happening, including sports.On April 30th 1985, 100 people linked with Balcombe village joined in for the annual Superstars competition.There are all types of athletic events for children and adults.It takes place each year for a week and originally started in 1977 to celebrate the Queens Jubilee. Other summer events are the Cuckfield annual cuckoo fair and Lindfield Village Day.There are lots of things happening for charity too.One Saturday evening at Oakmead's School in Burgess Hill,young rock music supporters turned up to a concert put on by various young groups where 400 tickets were sold before the event and Â£107 was collected.Â£1000 was collected at a sponsored 5 mile run for Haywards Heath Transport Association.
